short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Pomodoro countdown timer that helps you focus by blocking access to distracting websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
• 🔧 ⏱️ The block-list, timer duration and other settings are configurable.
• 🌟 🖋️ Add an icon and optionally a note to each timer session.
• 🔔 🫑 An audible bell helps you track your progress.
• 🏹 🎯 Achieve greater focus!
• 🧠 Designed for and by neurodivergent brains.
• 😎 ♿ Designed with accessibility in mind.
• 👷‍♀️‍ 🚧 Under active development.
